data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Għawdex.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Għawdex, Malta
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Għawdex, Malta the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 64 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Għawdex, Malta, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Għawdex with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Għajnsielem
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Għajnsielem, Għawdex, Malta.
Spirit, make the church in Għawdex, Malta humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Għawdex, Malta that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Għawdex, Malta has a population of 1,800.

We estimate Għawdex has 28 people who might know Jesus, 1,705 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 67 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 64 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Għawdex, Malta into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
